name: Avoid to use querySelectorAll
description: Compared to getElementsByTagName and getElementsByClassName, querySelectorAll can be 40 time slower.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
remediation: Instead of using querySelectorAll, you will use getElementsByTagName() or getElementsByClassName().

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance

qualityStandards.name: Data Resource Read and Write Access Excessive Complexity
